name: Vr Escape Room
description:
Our VR Escape Room game for the Oculus is a virtual reality experience designed for players to solve puzzles and escape a room. 

The game was developed by

Jamie - Programming

Ben - Design

Dennys - Art

It was created for a game design assignment. The game is fully compatible with the Oculus VR headset and requires players to use hand controllers to interact with the in-game environment and solve puzzles.
